InventoryCommandLine - Class in commandline
The command line interface for displaying the inventory, and choosing and using an item from it.

IO - Class in commandline
A input output class simple functionality for the input and ouput required for the command line program through static methods.
IO() - Constructor for class commandline.IO
 
isAwake() - Method in class game.monsters.Monster
Returns if the monster is awake or not.
isHeal() - Method in class game.Item
Whetehr or not the item is a healing item.
isRevive() - Method in class game.Item
Whether or not the item is a full revive item.
isValidName(String) - Static method in class game.Player
A static method determining if the given string is a valid name (3-15 characters, no special characters).
Item - Class in game
A single Item class, which contains the behviour for heal items, damage buff items, and full revives.
Item(String, int) - Constructor for class game.Item
Constructs an Item with a name and price, and sets healAmount and buffAmount to zero and isRevive to false, so the Item is initially not any type of item.
ItemBuilder - Class in game
A class which constructs each type of item, taking in a price and if applicable a size.
ItemBuilder() - Constructor for class game.ItemBuilder
 
ItemBuilder.ItemSize - Enum Class in game
An enum for the size of the item, either SMALL, MEDIUM, or LARGE.
ItemScreen - Class in GUI
Item screen shows players inventory and team that allows items to be used out of battle.
ItemScreen() - Constructor for class GUI.ItemScreen
Create the application.
